00020 #ifndef SUSAN_H
00021 #define SUSAN_H
00022 
00023 #include <cvd/image.h>
00024 #include <cvd/byte.h>
00025 #include <vector>
00026 #include <utility>
00027 
00028 #include "detectors.h"
00029 
00030 ///Class wrapping the SUSAN detector.
00031 ///@ingroup gDetect
00032 struct SUSAN: public DetectT
00033 {
00034     ///Detect corners
00035     ///@param i Image in which to detect corners
00036     ///@param c Detected corners are inserted in to this container
00037     ///@param N Threshold used to detect corners
00038     virtual void operator()(const CVD::Image<CVD::byte>& i, std::vector<CVD::ImageRef>& c, unsigned int N)const;
00039 };
